review.title: Well located, opposite beach and great shopping
review.reviewText: Nothing special, basic Hotel of this standard. Good room, average breakfast
review.locationRemarks: Very convenient on the main beach shopping strip

review.title: Decent room and hotel
review.reviewText: Staff was great location is great but is not a higher end hotel. Small Europe botique style   Clean and nice

review.title: Excellent location.Friendly st
review.reviewText: Great location, nice roof terrace with a view over the coast.  Helpful staff.  Good value for money, would recommend.
review.locationRemarks: Overlooks the promenade, perfect for the beach.

review.title: Great spot forPuccini Festival and a beach holiday
review.reviewText:
The hotel had for us a superb location and outstanding staff. It was right on the sea front and it was a good to have a seaview room. Our room was fine and the bed was very good. Reception recommended a family-run beach company across the road which provided umbrella, sunbed and chairs at a reasonable price and a family-style restaurant, offering delicious food.We ate there every day and enjoyed every meal.
We had a great breakfast every day at the hotel, very well supervised by the same highly efficient and charming man. Reception staff were equally at the top of their game and nothing was too much trouble for them.We had hired a car for our trip and reception offered an excellent parking deal which enabled us to park at a reasonable price on the sea front right outside the hotel. We went by car to 3 Puccini operas and, once we had found the way, it took us no more that 20 minutes max. to get to and from Torre del Lago. We felt very comfortable at the hotel and the excellent staff explained everying so there were no surprises at any time. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would be very happy to return. We strongly recommend Hotel San Francisco, Viareggio.
review.locationRemarks: Great beach front location ( we did not find noise to be a problem)
